GOP senators squirm over sex-related allegations against Trump Cabinet picks  —  Republican senators are squirming over the rash of sexual misconduct allegations against President-elect Trump's Cabinet picks, which they fear will become a focal point of Senate confirmation hearings next year.

Georgian ruling party defies protests, boycott to re-open parliament after disputed election  —  Lawmakers from Georgia's ruling party opened the first session of parliament on Monday after last month's disputed election, defying protesters outside and a boycott by opposition parties who say the vote was illegitimate.
